name: Sprout: Solstice
description:
It's the day of the Winter Solstice! You're normally super busy on this day, being a lil druid and all. However, your mentor has asked you to instead help the other villagers with the cooking for tonight's feast. Suddenly, your bestie Amandarina shows up at your door to ask for a huge favour.

What secrets will be revealed, and what new experiences will you two cook up together?

Content Warning

Contains mentions of death.

Controls

Interact with the world by "bumping" into the different items/characters. Whenever the game gives you a choice in a dialogue, use the arrow corresponding to each choice to choose that one.

  • Desktop: Use the arrow or WASD keys.
  • Mobile: Swipe in the direction you want to move to. You can hold for longer movements.
Acknowledgements
  • 👾 This game was made in binksi. Binksi was created by smwhr, and it's a fork of candle's bipsi that lets you create games using Inkle Studios' Ink.
  • The game makes uses of several plugins:
    • ↔️ Directional avatar by candle
    • 🎮 Gamepad support and WebGLazy integration both part of the bipsi hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc
    • 🔉 Bipsi sfxr plugin by Narkhos
  • 🎼 Arpanauts, Digital Native and We're All Under the Stars por Eric Skiff.
  • 🍳 Recipes taken from the Acción Naturista Magazine by the "Spanish Vegetarian Society".
